title: Animal Ecstasy
description: Normal relationships can be tough. Sometimes there’s just too much equality. So these guys come up with a simple solution. If their girlfriends and wives can’t handle the decisions and independence of being human, maybe they should be treated like animals instead…In this anthology, you’ll encounter beautiful girls who need to be collared, trained, and even milked. These girls will lose the rights and responsibilities that come with being people. Instead, they’ll become beloved pets. It might be humiliating at first, but they’ll adapt. Most importantly, they’ll learn to love their new Masters.Animal Ecstasy is a 50,000 word anthology about human pet training. It contains explicit content intended for adults only.
author: Kimmy Estrada
